subject: adf, Apply for A Credit Card for Those with Less than Perfect Credit!
body:
251839499/// color   pink name   True finches image   Abendkernbeisser m.jpg image_width  // 240





The Gold Card You Deserve...


If you're having problems getting a credit card due to past credit history this may be the offer for you. We offer a quick and easy application process.

You, too, could be enjoying the wide acceptance of a Gold Card even if 
		your credit history is less than perfect.


Low APR on purchases.24 hour account access by phone.
			Monthly credit bureau reporting.

Online access 
			to credit education.



FIRST PREMIER BANK CENTENNIAL GOLD CARD

First Premier Bank
